question: What tasks did Cinderella perform in her household?
references:
[{"content": "She employed her in meanest work of
the house: she scoured the dishes, tables, etc., and scrubbed madam's
chamber and those of misses, her daughters", "start_index": 2986, "end_index": 3134}, {"content": "Cinderella, for it was she who ironed her sisters' linen and plaited
their ruffles", "start_index": 4280, "end_index": 4362}]

question: What transformations did Cinderella's Godmother perform to prepare Cinderella for the ball?
references:
[{"content": "Her Godmother scooped out all the inside
of it, having left nothing but the rind; which done, she struck it with
her wand, and the pumpkin was instantly turned into a fine coach, gilded
all over with gold", "start_index": 6699, "end_index": 6903}, {"content": "She then went to look into her mousetrap, where she found six mice all
alive, and ordered Cinderella to lift up a little the trapdoor, when,
giving each mouse as it went out a little tap with her wand, the mouse
was that moment turned into a fine horse, which altogether made a very
fine set of six horses of a beautiful mouse-colored dapple-gray", "start_index": 6906, "end_index": 7252}, {"content": "The fairy made choice of one of the three which had the largest
beard, and having touched him with her wand he was turned into a fat,
jolly coachman, who had the smartest whiskers eyes ever beheld", "start_index": 7534, "end_index": 7730}, {"content": "She had no sooner done so but her Godmother turned them into six
footmen, who skipped up immediately behind the coach, with their liveries
all bedaubed with gold and silver, and clung as close behind each other
as if they had done nothing else their whole lives", "start_index": 7863, "end_index": 8124}, {"content": "Her Godmother only just touched her with her wand, and at the same
instant her clothes were turned into cloth-of-gold and silver, all beset
with jewels", "start_index": 8330, "end_index": 8481}]

question: Why was Bessie feeling sad as Thanksgiving approached?
references: [{"content": "Alas! she remembered her uncle's words when he gave her the turkey, \"On\nThanksgiving Day we will have him on the table.\"", "start_index": 21206, "end_index": 21326}, {"content": "Thanksgiving Day would be here in a week", "start_index": 21328, "end_index": 21368}]
